note: I am a 74 year old teacher who will be retiring in 2 years. I am a lifelong liberal Catholic and a Texan. I love to sing out loud and will do so in public . I teach US Government and Politics and have my degree in same. I study, follow politics daily making a point of keeping on top of events. I believe that facts exist and that honest men and women can discover them, even if not all of them, also that complex problems don't have black and white solutions. Finally, I believe in compassion.
